bibl.title: Gold Lamellae in the Burton Y. Berry Collection.
bibl.note: Bloomington, Indiana University Art Museum, Burton Y. Berry Collection, Inv. IUAM 71.22.125. Spell against every Spirit of Suffering (third or fourth cent. A.D.). - Inv. IUAM 71.22.117. Lamella Inscribed with Characters.
PARCA Maryline, Gold Lamellae in the Burton Y. Berry Collection.
Adriana CALINESCU (Ed.), Ancient Jewelry and Archaeology (Bloomington - Indianapolis, 1996) pp. 215-223, 4 figg.
